languages.text:
This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 rounds and decreases the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (20).
languages.original_text:
Граната создает токсичную область густого дыма на 4 раунда. Для всех, кто находится внутри, шанс совершить {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} и шанс получить попадание из {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционного{/g} оружия сокращается на 50%.
Цели в области действия выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} и в случае провала получают {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (20).

traits.locale_text:
Сreates a toxic area which lasts for 4 rounds. It decreases the hit chance and the chance to get hit with ranged weapons by 50% for anyone inside it.
Starting the round inside it or entering it forces a Toughness test and deals 5-8 toxic damage on fails.

This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 rounds and decreases the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} (20).

This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 rounds and decreases the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} (20).

This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 rounds and decreases chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} (20).

This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 rounds and decreases the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (20).

This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 rounds and decreases the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (20).

traits.locale_text:
Создает токсичную область на 4 раунда. Для всех, кто находится внутри, шанс совершить попадание и шанс получить попадание из дистанционного оружия сокращаются на 50%.
Каждый, кто входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, проходит проверку Выносливости и в случае провала получает 5–8 токсичного урона.

Создает токсичную область на 4 раунда. Для всех, кто находится внутри, шанс совершить попадание и шанс получить попадание из дистанционного оружия сокращаются на 50%.
Каждый, кто входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, проходит проверку Выносливости и в случае провала получает 5–8 токсичного урона.

Граната создает токсичную область густого дыма на 4 раунда. Для всех, кто находится внутри, шанс совершить {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} и шанс получить попадание из {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционного{/g} оружия сокращается на 50%.
Цели в области действия выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} со штрафом −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} и в случае провала получают эффект {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} (20).

languages.text:
制造一片毒烟区域，持续四轮。所有处于这片区域的生物{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}率都会下降50%，被{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程武器{/g}命中的几率也会降低50%。
受影响的目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中额外承受-{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}减值，未能通过检定的目标会受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（20）效果影响。
languages.original_text:
This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 rounds and decreases the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (20).

traits.locale_text:
制造一片毒烟区域，持续四轮。所有处于这片区域的生物{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}率都会下降50%，被{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程武器{/g}命中的几率也会降低50%。
受影响的目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中额外承受-{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}减值，未能通过检定的目标会受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（20）效果影响。

制造一片有毒区域，持续四{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。所有处于这片区域的生物，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}率都会下降50%，被{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器命中的几率也会降低50%。
所有受影响的目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受额外{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}。未能通过检定的目标会受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（20）效果影响。

languages.text:
Esta zona crea una zona tóxica de humo denso que dura 4 asaltos y reduce la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} y de recibir impactos con {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}armas a distancia{/g} un −50 %.
Si el objetivo de esa área falla una {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Resistencia{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}, sufre {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (20).
languages.original_text:
This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 rounds and decreases the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (20).

traits.locale_text:
Esta zona crea una zona tóxica de humo denso que dura 4 asaltos y reduce la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} y de recibir impactos con {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}armas a distancia{/g} un −50 %.
Si el objetivo de esa área falla una {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Resistencia{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}, sufre {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (20).

Crea una zona tóxica que dura 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Reduce la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} y la probabilidad de recibir impactos con armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} un −50 % para cualquiera que esté en la zona.
Si un objetivo en el área falla una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}, sufre {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (20)

languages.text:
このグレネードは、4ラウンド持続する濃い煙の有毒エリアを作り出し、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}を下げ、{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠隔武器{/g}による命中率を−50%下げる。
そのエリア内のターゲットが−{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（20）の影響を受ける。
languages.original_text:
This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 rounds and decreases the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (20).

traits.locale_text:
このグレネードは、4ラウンド持続する濃い煙の有毒エリアを作り出し、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}を下げ、{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠隔武器{/g}による命中率を−50%下げる。
そのエリア内のターゲットが−{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（20）の影響を受ける。

このグレネードは、4{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}消えない濃い煙が漂う毒エリアを生み出して、{g|Encyclopedia:Range}レンジ{/g}ウェポンで{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}を当てる確立と当たる確立どちらも-50%減少させる。
毒エリアにいるターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗して、−{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を課せられると、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}(20)効果を受ける。

languages.text:
Diese Granate erzeugt in einem Bereich giftigen Rauch, der 4 Runden lang andauert und die {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} bzw. die Gefahr, mit {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfwaffen{/g} getroffen zu werden, um −50 % senkt.
Besteht ein betroffenes Ziel die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} nicht, wird es mit {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} (20) belegt.
languages.original_text:
This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 rounds and decreases the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (20).

traits.locale_text:
Diese Granate erzeugt in einem Bereich giftigen Rauch, der 4 Runden lang andauert und die {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g}chance bzw. die Gefahr, mit{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfwaffen{/g} getroffen zu werden, um -50 % senkt.
Besteht ein betroffenes Ziel die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} nicht, wird es mit{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} (20) belegt.

Diese Granate erzeugt einen giftigen Bereich mit dichtem Rauch, der für 4 Runden anhält und die Chance auf einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} sowie das Erleiden eines Treffers durch {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfwaffen{/g} um −50 % verringert.
Wenn das Ziel in diesem Bereich eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} nicht besteht, erleidet es {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}(20).

languages.text:
Cette grenade génère un nuage d'épaisse fumée toxique qui dure 4 rounds et réduit de −50 % les chances d'infliger et de recevoir un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}arme à distance{/g}.
La cible présente dans la zone doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (20).
languages.original_text:
This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 rounds and decreases the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (20).

traits.locale_text:
Cette grenade génère un nuage d'épaisse fumée toxique qui dure 4 rounds et réduit de −50 % les chances d'infliger et de recevoir un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}arme à distance{/g}.
La cible présente dans la zone doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (20).

Cette grenade génère une zone d'épaisse fumée toxique qui dure 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} et réduit de −50 % les chances de porter ou de subir un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} à l'aide d'armes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}.
Si la cible présente dans la zone échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (20).

Cette grenade génère un nuage d'épaisse fumée toxique qui dure 4 rounds et réduit de −50 % les chances d'infliger et de recevoir un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}arme à distance{/g}.
La cible présente dans la zone doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef}. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (20).

languages.text:
Bu bomba, kalın sis bulutuyla kaplı toksik bir alan oluşturur. Alan 4 raunt kalır ve {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}menzilli silahlarla{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurma{/g} ve vurulma olasılıklarını %50 azaltır.
Bu alandaki hedef, −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçemezse {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksine{/g} (20) maruz kalır.
languages.original_text:

If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (20).
